HW3: 5.3.1, 5.4.1, 5.4.2, 5.4.3


5.3.1
[tag[28]:index[4]]

pretty bad cache


5.4.1
2^5 32bits = 8 words, assuming a word is 4bits
2^6 = 64bits = 16 words, assuming a word is 4bits


5.4.2
2^5 = 32 cache entries
2^6 = 64 cache entries

5.4.3
a)
data storage: 32B
total bits: tag[22] + valid[1] + data
256 + 22 + 1 / 256

b)
data storage: 64B
total bits: tag[22] + valid[1] + data
512 + 20 + 1 / 512
